intro.subtitle1:
Certify is your secure identity that connects
you to your corporate applications
intro.subtitle2:
Sign in securely to your corporate applications
using one single account and password
intro.subtitle3:
Enjoy the same seamless sign-in experience
across all your corporate applications

login.mfa_subtitle: Enter code from your Authenticator app
login.success_info: Hold on while going back to {{appName}}
login.lost_totp_access: Canâ€™t access your Authenticator app? Contact IS Helpdesk for assistance

biometrics.setup_successful_subtitle: {{bioType}} login has been set up successfully.
biometrics.enable_successful_subtitle:
{{bioType}} login has been enabled!
Setup will be completed upon next login.
biometrics.auth_prompt: Login to Certify with your fingerprint
biometrics.cannot_enable_subtitle: {{bioType}} could have been temporarily locked or app permissions for {{bioType}} were not given!

select_prefer_method.title: Select your preferred method for
select_prefer_method.sms_guide: Authenticate using a code sent via text message to your phone
select_prefer_method.authentication_app_guide: Authenticate using a code generated by an app installed on your mobile device or computer

sms_setup.title: Set up SMS
sms_setup.otp_phone: we have delivered the authentication code by SMS to {{value}}. Please enter the code to complete authentication

totp_setup.title: Set up authenticator app
totp_setup.step_one_guide: Install an authenticator app on your mobile device.
totp_setup.step_two_guide: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app.
totp_setup.enter_code: Enter the code from your authenticator app

mfa.mfa_setup_totp_successfully: Authenticator app successfully linked to your account
mfa.mfa_setup_sms_successfully: Authenticate sms successfully linked to your account

alert.exit_temp_password: Do you want to go back to login?
alert.exit_reset: Do you want to go back to login?
alert.activate_success: An email has been sent to {{email}}.
alert.session_expired: Your sign in session has expired!
alert.phone_number_require: Your account doesn't have phone number, please contact IS Helpdesk for assistance.

error.no_valid_email: Invalid email, please contact IS Helpdesk for assistance.
error.no_verified_email: Account not yet activated, please activate your account.
error.Default: Request failed, please contact IS Helpdesk for assistance.
error.UserDisabled: Your account has been suspended, please contact IS Helpdesk for assistance.
error.ErrorSendEmail: Email not sent, please try again later.
error.AlreadyConfirmed: Your account has already been confirmed.
error.Invalid_verification_code_provided,_plea: Invalid code, please click on Resend OTP to get a new code.
error.Attempt_limit_exceeded,_please_try_after: Too many failed login attempts, please try again later.
error.1_validation_error_detected:_Value_at_'p: Your password must have at least 8 characters.
error.Password_does_not_conform_to_policy:_Pas: Your password must have at least 8 characters.
Your password must contain at least 1 symbol.
Your password must contain at least 1 uppercase character.
Your password must contain at least 1 lowercase character.
Your password must contain at least 1 digit.
error.Password_did_not_conform_with_policy:_Pa: Your password must have at least 8 characters
Your password must contain at least 1 symbol.
Your password must contain at least 1 uppercase character.
Your password must contain at least 1 lowercase character.
Your password must contain at least 1 digit.
error.Member_must_have_length_greater_than_or_: Your password must have at least 8 characters.
error.Invalid_code_provided,_please_request_a_: Invalid code, please click on Resend OTP to get a new code.
error.Unable_to_login_because_of_security_reas: Your account has been temporarily locked due to security reasons. Please contact IS Helpdesk for assistance.
error.PreAuthentication_failed_with_error_HTTP: Your account is suspended. Please contact IS Helpdesk for assistance.
